name: Thunder
description: Damage from concussive sound and shockwaves that can shatter objects, rupture eardrums, and knock creatures back with sonic force.

immunityCommon: Creatures that don't rely on hearing
vulnerabilityCommon: Some constructs made of brittle materials

specialRules: Can shatter glass, crystal, and brittle objects
Often accompanied by knockback or forced movement
Can be heard at great distances
Effective against objects with structural weaknesses
Thunderwave pushes creatures 10 feet on a failed save
Can trigger avalanches or rockslides (DM discretion)
